薧字的基本解释

薧
hāo
〔薧里〕坟墓。

薧
kǎo
干的食物：“凡其死、生、鲜、薧之物，以共王之膳。”

薧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kǎo］
［《廣韻》苦浩切，上晧，溪。］
(1)枯干。
(2)干的、腌制的。亦指干的或腌制的食物。

薧字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　薧； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1062第06
【集韻】【韻會】?苦浩切，音考。乾魚。【周禮·天官·庖人】辨魚物爲鱻薧。【本草釋名】鮑魚，《禮記》謂之薧。　又【禮·內則】菫、荁、枌、楡、免、薧，滫瀡以滑之。【註】免，新生者。薧，乾也。　又【集韻】口到切，音靠。義同。　又通蒿。【唐韻】薧里，死人里也。

考證：〔【禮·內則】菫荁枌楡，兔薧滫瀡以滑之。〕　謹照原文兔改免。
薧字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
薧字的起名意思

暂无。

Zhe
Basic explanation of words
Zhe
hāo
〔薧里〕The tomb.
Zhe
kǎo
Dry food: "Anything that is dead, alive, fresh, or glutinous, is the king's meal."
Zhe
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kǎo］
["Guangyun" bitter and holy cut, Shanghao, Xi. ]
(1) Withered.
(2) Dry and pickled. Also refers to dried or pickled foods.
Zhe
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　薧; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1062 Page 06
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Hard to cut, sound test. Dried fish. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Bo Ren】Distinguish fish from fish. [Materia Medica name] Abalone, "Book of Rites" is called Zou.　[Rite·Nei Ze] 菫, 荁, tart, 楡, free, 薧, 滫瀡 to slip. [Note] Free, new students. Hey, do it.　[Jiyun] The mouth is cut, and the sound depends on it. The same meaning.　Through Artemisia again. [Tang Yun] Zuli, also in the dead. Textual research: [[Ritual·Nei Ze] Fructus calamus, L. leucocephalus is smooth. 〕　I would like to change the exemption according to the original rabbit.
Zhe
